General.Name: Aptamer Sciences Inc
General.Description: Aptamer Sciences, Inc., a bio venture company, focuses on the Aptamer technology platform for the development of therapeutic and diagnostic platforms. The company's aptamer platforms include aptamer discovery, optimization, and the development of therapeutics and diagnostics. It offers AlloMAp and BiFAp platform programs for therapeutics; and diagnosis kits for lung and pancreatic cancer, as well as in-vitro diagnostic kits for the early diagnosis of lung cancer. Aptamer Sciences, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: 407 Ho, Healthcare Innovation Park, Seongnam, South Korea, 13605
